About the Company: Tiger Logistics (India) Limited provides third party logistic services for corporate and multinational companies in India and internationally. It offers ocean and air freight forwarding services; project cargo handling services; custom clearance services comprising handling and execution of customs brokering, documentation, and inland clearance; and warehousing and transportation services, as well as supply chain management services. The company provides its services to automotive and engineering, aviation, agri and perishable products cargo, consumer durables and retail, and chemicals and hazardous industries. Tiger Logistics (India) Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in New Delhi, India..The company also engagged in the business of Logistics.
